full_output.summary: I am a fourth-year Computer Science Engineering student with practical experience in analyzing data, building statistical models, and creating visualizations. I am looking for an entry-level position in Data Science or Data Analysis where I can use my skills to uncover insights and support decision-making. I am excited to apply my knowledge to help organizations solve real problems and achieve their goals.

projects.name: Text Insight Explorer: Unveiling Sentiments and Readability
projects.description: This project evaluates text to uncover its emotional tone and readability, offering a view of its complexity and sentiment. The project cleans and tokenizes text, evaluates sentiment with word lists, and computes readability metrics like the Fog Index and average sentence length, with results on complex words and syllables summarized in Excel.

projects.name: IPL complete insights using Power BI
projects.description: Developed an interactive IPL dashboard for visualizing and analyzing various aspects of the Indian Premier League (IPL). I used Power BI to create parameterized charts and dynamic parameters, including simple to complex DAX, for detailed analysis.

projects.name: Ophthalmic Intelligence: using Vision AI for enhanced diagnosis
projects.description: We are developing machine-learning techniques to improve the diagnosis of Glaucoma. Our team is developing and refining machine learning algorithms to analyze eye medical images. We aim to enhance Glaucoma detection accuracy by training these models with data and continuously improving them based on new insights and feedback.

experiences.description: Built machine learning models for Medical Visual Question Answering at IIT Kharagpur, and plotted graphs to gain insights. Among the different models, MUTAN achieved the highest accuracy of 80.5% and the lowest loss of 0.56. The MED-VQA dataset provided the best performance across all three models, with an average accuracy of 76.87%.

experiences.role_name: Data Analytics and Visualization Job Simulation
experiences.description: Cleaned, modeled, and analyzed three datasets to identify the top 5 most popular content categories, with Animals ranking first, receiving 68,624 reactions. May had the highest content postings, with a total of 1,954 posts.

full_output.name: Koustav Sengupta
